item.title: Best free webhost!
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

500gigs?
Unmetered BW?
Oversell much?

(for 30$ per anum)

So from what it says there you’d be pretty happy for me to sign up and run a full blown CGI Proxy or maybe set-up a mirror for some huge site or host adult content and a torrent indexing site for 30$. You don’t have a real website, just a forum and it seems like you’re on reseller.

l0l

Oh and the quick register doesn’t work on your site, i filled it in and it says “Sorry, but users under the age of 15 are not allowed to register on this forum.” yet I’m 17 and it didn’t ask for age?

You just lost a customer omg.

Read full topic
